item.content:encoded:
Everybody Eats is a gluten-free and nut-free bakery. We created their first online store in 2006 and just re-designed and re-launched their store to kick off 2015! We also tried our hands at tabletop photography with this project and did the product photography in-house.

everybodyeats-inc.com

Client Quote

Hello guys,
Just a thank you note.
The website is working great, people love it, no BS and straight to the point!
Pedro Arroba â€“ Everybody Eats

item.title: Francina Stewart
item.dc:creator: Brent Lagerman
item.description:
Francina Stewart is a baker with a wide range of talents, she wanted a website and blog design that showed off all of her many talents and also looked and felt like ‘her’. We helped get her personality into the site by using her handwriting to create the logo. The rest of the website’s design […]

The post Francina Stewart appeared first on mimoYmima.
item.content:encoded:
Francina Stewart is a baker with a wide range of talents, she wanted a website and blog design that showed off all of her many talents and also looked and felt like ‘her’. We helped get her personality into the site by using her handwriting to create the logo. The rest of the website’s design is inspired by her cakes, she even came over and gave us some baking lessons! Life is sweet:

Francina on Pinterest

The post Francina Stewart appeared first on mimoYmima.
